QI.5.description: Existence of descriptions about its size

QI.6.description: Existence of descriptions about its structure (MIME Type, Format)

QI.7.description: Existence of descriptions about its organization and categorization

QI.8.description: Existence of information about the kind and number of used vocabularies

QI.9.description: Existence of dereferencable links for the dataset and its resources

QI.19.description: Existence of an RDF dump that can be downloaded by users

QI.20.description: Existence of queryable endpoints that respond to direct queries

QI.21.description: Existence of valid dereferencable URLs (respond to HTTP request)

QI.22.description: Existence of human and machine readable license information

QI.23.description: Existence of dereferencable links to the full license information

QI.25.description: Existence of timestamps that can keep track of its modifications

QI.26.description: Includes the correct MIME type for the content

QI.27.description: Includes the correct size for the content

QI.28.description: Absence of syntactic errors on the instance level

QI.29.description: Absence of Syntactic errors on the links level

QI.37.description: Existence of at least one exemplary URI

QI.38.description: Existence of at least one exemplary SPARQL Query

QI.39.description: Existence of general information (title, URL, description) for the dataset

QI.40.description: Existence of mailing list, message board or point of contact
Existence of metadata that describes its authoritative information

QI.43.description: Uses login credentials to restrict access

QI.44.description: Uses SSL or SSH to provide access to the dataset
